canPlayersManageAttributes.name: Players Can Manage Attributes
canPlayersManageAttributes.hint: This allows players who have edit access to a document to be able to edit what attributes those characters have via the attribute editor

error.invalid-socket: Invalid socket data received, this means a module or system bug is present.
error.unknown-socket-event: An unknown socket event was received: {event}
error.malformed-socket-payload: Socket event "{event}" received with malformed payload. Details: {details}
